Quick Escape.name: Quick Escape
Quick Escape.description: Chance to gain movement speed on being hit

levels.name: Quick Escape I
levels.note: On Being Hit: 5% chance to gain 25% movement speed for the next 5 seconds. Quick Escape will dispel if the caster uses an ability.

levels.name: Quick Escape II
levels.note: Your Quick Escape will last an additional 5 seconds.

levels.name: Quick Escape III
levels.note: Your movement speed is increased to 35% for your Quick Escape.

levels.name: Improved Flee I
levels.note: Your Flee will last an additional 5 seconds.

levels.name: Improved Flee II
levels.note: Flee will no longer prevent your Action Points from regenerating.

Hardy Concession.name: Hardy Concession
Hardy Concession.description: Damage that you recieve is reduced, but the damage and healing that you deal is reduced by the same amount.

levels.name: Hardy Concession I
levels.note: Damage that you recieve is reduced by 1%, but the damage and healing that you deal is reduced by the same amount.

levels.name: Hardy Concession II
levels.note: Damage that you recieve is reduced by 3%, but the damage and healing that you deal is reduced by the same amount.

levels.name: Hardy Concession III
levels.note: Damage that you recieve is reduced by 6%, but the damage and healing that you deal is reduced by the same amount.

levels.name: Hardy Concession IV
levels.note: Damage that you recieve is reduced by 10%, but the damage and healing that you deal is reduced by the same amount.

levels.name: Hardy Concession V
levels.note: Damage that you recieve is reduced by 15%, but the damage and healing that you deal is reduced by the same amount.
